text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
We're here at last! I'm so<n>super-duper-ultra excited for
summer<n>camp!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Buuut... this isn't just time to jump<n>for joy! Isn't that right,
Trainer?

Right... While summer camp is our<n>chance to train, there's
also a special<n>event happening this year.

There's a race that follows the road<n>from the beach all the
way to camp...<n>And Kawakami Princess has entered<n>to
run.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I even thought all about the most<n>important things from the
movie!<n>Today we've got to show off the true<n>bond
between a princess and her<n>prince!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, I thought I smelled a<n>commoner. It's the same
smell of<n>cheap noodles that, unlike authentic<n>ramen, will
live out their life in<n>anonymity!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's you! Dark Princ—ahem—I<n>mean, the bully from
before!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: Heh... I suppose you hope to join therace today? I wouldn't recommend it,since I'll be participating.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Heh heh heh... I'm sure even you<n>understand now. You'll
never win<n>against a real princess, so why don't<n>you just
slink off—

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Never! There's no way I'll back<n>down from this battle! As a
fighting<n>princess, I'll be there, with my prince<n>by my side!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Hmph! You just don't learn, but have<n>it your way... I'll
simply have to crush<n>you underfoot this time!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I can't really compare<n>to her. I might hate it,
but I saw the<n>truth when we raced.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Still... I won't run away from this! I<n>have to win! We have to
combine our<n>powers to defeat her, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
So we need to start strategizing right<n>away! First things
first...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
A name for our battle plan! I'm<n>thinking either, "The
Princess and<n>Prince's Big Banquet" or "The Power<n>of Two
- Winds of Victory!" Which one<n>do you like?
choice_data_list: We can always think of the name later...

text_block_list.text:
After our strategy meeting, the day<n>gets even hotter, leading
into the fiery<n>race we've prepped for!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Hyaaah!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Well, look at you! All that confidence,<n>only to get worn out so
soon!

text_block_list.name: Student Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're past the midpoint! The hot<n>summer sun must be
taking a toll on<n>their stamina! Who will pull ahead?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Hehehe! Make wayfor a real princess! Raaaaagh!

Someone in the back is sprinting all<n>the way to the lead...
It's Dark<n>Princess!

text_block_list.name: Student Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're almost at the finish line! It<n>looks like first place is
going to—hold<n>on!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: HIIIYAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Student Caster
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami's pulled away from the<n>pack! That's one big
burst of speed!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! But she was exhausted.<n>Where's that power coming
from?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hraaagh! Princess Acceleration...<n>times a trillion!

text_block_list.name: Student Caster
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami's caught up to the lead<n>right before the finish!
Who will claim<n>the win?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... You don't know whoyou're messing with! Victory goes to...the true—

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: It goes to the princess with a true<n>bond! And that's MEEE!

text_block_list.name: Student Caster
text_block_list.text: Finish! First place goes to...<n>Kawakami! She won by a nose!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hah! I did it! Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: N-no... This can't beee! How... How<n>could I lose?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I saw through your trick. You're good<n>at charging ahead
from the back<n>during the last leg.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: What did you say?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I did lose to you once, so my trainer<n>found out all about you.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's why our plan was to wait until<n>you went full strength,
then I'd dish<n>out all my power at once and return<n>the
favor! It's called...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
"Princess Power Times a Trillion -<n>Demolish Dark Princess
with Our True<n>Bond!" Catchy, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Still though, we put all that work into<n>our strategy, but it was
a close one!<n>You really are a tough enemy!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text: Hmph... I don't need your pathetic<n>consolations!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Come on, we're not enemies<n>anymore since the race is
over!<n>That's a Princess Fighter promise!<n>From today on,
we're friendly rivals!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
Hah, you like Princess Fighter? I<n>stopped watching that
years ago.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
What?! I knew it—you're a Princess<n>Fighter fan too! Cause
all your lines<n>were just like Dark Princess!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume with Princess Curls
text_block_list.text:
E-enough of that! You're totally<n>wrong! I only watched it
when I ate<n>instant noodles at snack time...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes, yesss! This is a victory for<n>the powerful bond
between a princess<n>and her prince!

It's just us on the moonlit beach, and<n>Kawakami Princess
is filled with glee<n>after her big win.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I forgot, Trainer! There's something I<n>really wanted to try if I
won! Can we?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, okay, here it is! Um... You<n>remember the last part of
the movie? I<n>want to recreate it with the two of us!
choice_data_list: The last scene in Princess Fighter?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! On their way home after saving<n>Earth, the princess
and prince have a<n>heart-to-heart on the moon!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Let's see... Ahem! O-okay, here I go!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: "Prince... We did it... We saved the<n>planet."

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
"But this isn't the end. Everyone's<n>waiting for us back on
Earth!"
choice_data_list: "You're right. Our race isn't over yet."

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
"No matter the battle, I will overcome<n>it! Because I... I am
with my one and<n>only prince!"

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! The bond between them really<n>is special!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (And the prince of my destiny... isright here in front of me!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Heehee! With the power of our bond,<n>we're going to
perform the greatest<n>miracles the world's ever seen!
